author: petervg
title: Landano: Cardano land registry Dapp
description: As pessoas em países com sistemas de registro de terras ineficientes e não confiáveis não podem usar as terras que possuem como alavancagem financeira.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal seeks to solve the problem of unreliable land registry systems by a land registry dApp  which aligns with the challenge goal of a foundational property registry.
The proposal does a good job of articulating the value to Cardano ecosystem, articulating how the solution scales to address future challenges
The proposal could be improved by providing key metrics and goals that closely align with the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal articulates the feasibility aspects of budget is broken down and reasonable, detailed technical explanation of the solution and a challenges and risks section.

The proposal does an excellent job of providing evidence of experience (linkedin profile), team composition, realistic timetable and plan, and resources required.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal includes excellent examples of a roadmap, milestones and time horizon.
The proposal includes a clear understandable description of the targeted problem and
a detailed description of the solution that addresses the problem.
To improve the proposal include metrics/KPIs to measure proposal success.

f6_assessments.q0: This is a real estate identification project, helping the poor and less knowledgeable about the law easier to spend in asserting their land ownership in the local area.
f6_assessments.q1: The project will face many obstacles if the local laws are incomplete, land ownership is not easy to confirm because the land history may not have enough documents to verify. To identify a piece of land, it needs the approval and participation of the government as well as the people. While disputes are inherently not easy to resolve.
f6_assessments.q2: It is difficult to tally the project KPIs if you are not a local, understand the local laws and the actual land ownership situation.

f6_assessments.q0: An attempt to put a cadastre of land on chain is a dream for a lot of projects for a lot of time and the impact of such a solution. if executed successfully would be monumental. Landano team seems to have a good understanding of the issues in Ghana, local legal contacts, technical and social grasp necessary to tackle such an issue.
f6_assessments.q1: The team is large and professional in their respective areas as well as active in Cardano community for some time. Plan is very detailed and well thought out. Budget is clearly broken down and explained, timeline is openly and clearly presented, risks are taken into consideration and accepted. All of this doesn't change the fact that the problem is really big and complicated and immensely difficult to tackle. Having said that, I think that Landano team positioned themselves extremely well to tackle it.
f6_assessments.q2: Landano simply checks all the boxes for auditability: milestones are clear, timeline is clear, KPIs clearly stated, budget breakdown is precise. Additionally, all code will be open-source which provides additional level of transparency.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal to build a land registry app for Ghanians is effectively addressing the challenge to build dapps on Cardano for global societies cross nations to adapt.
f6_assessments.q1: The WADA team has a strong past resume in catalyst funds and I do like that their plan is a hybrid solution (acknowledges the need for local legal professionals to exist in this registry framework). The team experience, solution deliverables, roadmap and budget section are all detailed in the proposal. Please consider adding a FAQ or protocol docs section to your website.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal includes sufficient information to audit the success of the proposal, the WADA team have successfully delivered on previous proposals their team has the dev experience to build the solution and their timeline/budget can be audited by CAs in future.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal for a Cardano land registry is precisely the spirit and intent of the Brief.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team is broadly experienced and sufficiently connected to the community to implement this project successfully. The plan is cogent and well reasoned. It is measurable and audacious.

If successful, this is exactly the type of project we all would feel proud of, it is a fulfillment, in part, of blockchain's promise.
f6_assessments.q2: The milestones are well reasoned, specific, measurable, auditable, time-fenced, and by being so allow the community to audit the progress and success of the project.

solution: Landano registra títulos de terra através de um Dapp e de um mapa cadastral tokenizado. As transações são feitas legalmente por profissionais jurídicos locais.
